title: 06/14/2021 - Best Of The Herd
itunes:title: 06/14/2021 - Best Of The Herd
description:
Colin shares his excitement that Chris Paul is finally getting all the respect he deserves after sweeping the Nuggets and carrying the Suns into the Western Conference Finals. He discusses the Nets losing Kyrie Irving to an ankle injury and what this means for Kevin Durant now that he will have to carry Brooklyn without his 2 superstar teammates. He also tells you why he was right about Dak Prescott and wrong about Ben Simmons. Plus, former TE Greg Olsen joins the show to talk about the disconnect between Aaron Rodgers and the Packers organization.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

He discusses the Nets losing Kyrie Irving to an ankle injury and what this means for Kevin Durant now that he will have to carry Brooklyn without his 2 superstar teammates. He also tells you why he was right about Dak Prescott and wrong about Ben Simmons. Plus, former TE Greg Olsen joins the show to talk about the disconnect between Aaron Rodgers and the Packers organization.
